name: Elys Network
description: Elys Network is a next-gen perpetual trading and all-in-one Defi platform operating as a Cosmos-SDK built ultra fast layer 1 network.The Elys Network platform includes a webapp with integrated account abstraction for seamless onboarding, fiat on-off ramps, IBC and EVM connectivity. The full suite of DeFi functions includes spot swaps, perpetual trading, liquidity pools, staking, USDC lending, and leverage LP.
